name: Wired Soul
description:
Wired Soul has been a labor of love for nearly five years,
first shown in public in early demo form at HSP Program Contest 2011,
where it received the Windows 100% Award and earned positive reviews,
and HSP founder Onitama himself called it "out of the ordinary".

The game is our tribute to arcade and early console gaming's revered
"belt side scrolling action" genre, to entertain ourselves and fans of the world.
Please play it to the end for a special surprise.
